revision.comment: move lang= to 1= in {{IPA}}; move lang= to 1= in {{diminutive of}}
revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|nci|xoxotlato}} {{qualifier|obsolete spelling}} ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|nci|xoxōtla|tōn|t1=firefly}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|[ʃo.ʃoːˈt͡ɬa.toːn]}} ===Noun=== {{nci-noun|a|xoxōtlatōn}} # {{diminutive of|nci|xoxōtla}}; a small [[firefly]] #* '''1571''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 78v. col. 2. #*: Luciernaga. ycpitl. copitl. xoxotla. '''xoxotlato'''. #*:: A firefly. ycpitl. copitl. xoxotla. '''xoxotlato'''. #* ''Idem'', f. 161v. col. 1. #*: '''Xoxotlato'''. luciernaga. #*:: '''Xoxotlato'''. a firefly. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|firely}} {{l|nci|copitl}}, {{l|nci|icpitl}} ===References=== * {{cite-book|author=[[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]]|year=1571|title=Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|publisher=Editorial Porrúa|pages=78v, 161v}} * {{cite-book|author=[[w:Rémi Siméon|Rémi Siméon]]|year=1885|title=Diccionario de la lengua náhuatl o mexicana|publisher=Siglo Veintiuno Editores|page=782}} [[Category:nci:Insects]] [[Category:nci:Light sources]]
